amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provided for the consideration of H.R. 2657 and considered as adopted an amendment that prohibits any funds in the bill from being used to provide supplemental dental or vision health insurance benefits for Members and employees of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: The amendment seeks to insert an entirely new text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Linder amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Linder.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Linder.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Linder amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Linder amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
